info.name: ELIXIR API
info.description: Elixir offers a powerful REST API that supports tokenization in the bitcoin's sidechain of Liquid. It brings powerful features to create a unique NFT standard technology for inter-operable skins.

item.description:
The Elixir API usesAPI Keysto authenticate requests. Authentication to the API is performed with a key. Provide your API key on the token header.
All API requests must be made over HTTPS. Calls made over plain HTTP will fail. API Requests without authentication will also fail.
